fullDescription:
Basketball Championship is an addictive sports arcade where precision and timing decide your victory. Shoot hoops in vibrant 3D courts, earn combo scores, and unlock higher levels as the crowd cheers you on.

Featuring dynamic effects like flaming shots and score pop-ups ('AMAZING!', 'BREATHTAKING!'), every throw feels rewarding across multiple game modes and difficulty levels.
